org.barghos.core.color

Class HDRColor3

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.barghos.core.color.HDRColor3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IColor3R, IColor3W, IHDRColor3R, IHDRColor3W, ITup3fR, ITup3fW, ITup3R, ITupfR, ITupfW, ITupR

    public class HDRColor3
extends java.lang.Object
implements IHDRColor3R, IHDRColor3W
    This class is a simple implementation of an HDRColor3.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HDRColor3

        public HDRColor3()
        This is the default constructor. It is commonly used by a pool. It sets all components to 0.0 what is equal to black color.

      • HDRColor3

        public HDRColor3(ITup3R t)
        This constructor sets the components to t. The values of t are interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits
        Parameters:
        t - A tuple that the components are set to.

      • HDRColor3

        public HDRColor3(double scalar)
        This constructor sets the components to scalar. The scalar is interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        scalar - A value that the components are set to.

      • HDRColor3

        public HDRColor3(int scalar)
        This constructor sets the components to scalar. The scalar is interpreted as in colorrange (0 - 255) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        scalar - A value that the components are set to.

      • HDRColor3

        public HDRColor3(double r,
                 double g,
                 double b)
        This constructor sets the components to r, g and b. r, g and b are interpreted as in unitspace (0.0 - 1.0) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component in unitspace.
        g - The green component in unitspace.
        b - The blue component in unitspace.

      • HDRColor3

        public HDRColor3(int r,
                 int g,
                 int b)
        This constructor sets the components to r, g and b. r, g and b are interpreted as in colorspace (0 - 255) but can exceed these limits.
        Parameters:
        r - The red component in colorspace.
        g - The green component in colorspace.
        b - The blue component in colorspace.
